# Support Information

Before opening a new issue or discussion, please search through existing ones. Someone might have already solved your problem.

## ğŸ’¬ Discussions

For general questions, "how-to" guides, and architectural discussions, please use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/fitness_tracker_application/fitness_tracker_application/discussions).

If you've found a bug or have a suggestion, please use our [Issue Templates](https://github.com/fitness_tracker_application/fitness_tracker_application/issues/new/choose).
